greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Largest natural number x such that x=n+A000120(x), or zero if no such number exists.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1024
program: (Scheme): (define (A213724 n) (if (zero? n) 1 (let ((v (A213723 n))) (if (zero? v) v (+ 1 v)))))
xref: One more than A213723 at its nonzero points. a(A005187(n)) = A005408(n). Used for computing A213725-A213727.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 01 2012
